a.title: Getting Involved in Local Government Guide

li.a: Getting Involved in Local Government Guide

a.title: Getting Involved in Local Government Guide

li.a: Getting Involved in Local Government Guide

span.p: I hope that you and your family are staying healthy and are making the best of this very challenging situation we are in the middle of. Yesterday I told our staff in an email that I felt like we were the Starship Enterprise and charting new territory into our new frontier. Together we will get through this and be stronger because of it.

Today, Governor Bullock announced the continued closure of schools through April 24, 2020. This means that we will continue to provide distance learning support to our students at least through this date. The Governor has made it clear that he plans to announce any continued closure for two-week intervals and his announcement today was consistent with this. Please continue to shelter in home and practice social distancing when in the public.

For this reason, our teachers and principals will continue to communicate with you in providing on-line learning opportunities and packet pick-up for students who need this option. If you have any questions on this support, please contact your child’s teacher or principal. Google classroom is the primary learning platform that most teachers are using.
I recently read a great letter from a teacher addressing his/her parents during this time of school closures. Click here to read this article.

During this time of finding appropriate safety equipment for our healthcare providers our schools are doing their part in providing 3D printed safety masks for our community. Besides GHS, FHS, KMS and our elementary schools are doing their part in printing these needed safety masks. Click here read how one young man from GHS is doing his part.
Do you have questions about Covid19 or concerned about family members having symptoms? You can call the Kalispell Regional Healthcare hotline phone number at 890-7272.
As always, please let me know if I can assist you in any way.
Take care and stay healthy. Mark

div.div:
This is a secure Staff Intranet content page and cannot be viewed by the public. Please contact your Technology Director to gain access to the Staff Intranet area in order to view this page.
Thank you,
